overview: Dr. Sukarya is a docent who is suspended for defending a university student. To support the family, his wife, Jelina, works in a travel agency. There, she a husband and wife from Malaysia who want her to be a host uterus for their in-vitro fertilization baby. Because they offer her a huge sum of money, Jelina agrees. But when the baby is born, a conflict arises when she canâ€™t let go of the child.
title: In Vitro Fertilisation
